name: R4B-NutritionProduct-R5-NutritionProduct
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B NutritionProduct into FHIR R5

element.display: A product used for nutritional purposes

target.display: A product used for nutritional purposes (i.e. food or supplement)
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct`

element.display: A category or class of the nutrition product (halal, kosher, gluten free, vegan, etc)

target.display: Broad product groups or categories used to classify the product, such as Legume and Legume Products, Beverages, or Beef Products
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.category` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.category`

element.display: A code designating a specific type of nutritional product

target.display: A code that can identify the detailed nutrients and ingredients in a specific food product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.code` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.code`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.contained`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.implicitRules`

element.display: Ingredients contained in this product

target.display: Ingredients contained in this product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient`

element.display: The amount of ingredient that is in the product

target.display: The amount of ingredient that is in the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.amount` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R4B `amount` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `amount`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.id`

element.display: The ingredient contained in the product

target.display: The ingredient contained in the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.item` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.ingredient.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.ingredient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: One or several physical instances or occurrences of the nutrition product

target.display: One or several physical instances or occurrences of the nutrition product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance` - instance changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: The expiry date or date and time for the product

target.display: The expiry date or date and time for the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.expiry` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.expiry`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.id`

element.display: The identifier for the physical instance, typically a serial number

target.display: The identifier for the physical instance, typically a serial number or manufacturer number
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.identifier`

element.display: The identification of the batch or lot of the product

target.display: The identification of the batch or lot of the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.lotNumber` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.lotNumber`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: The amount of items or instances

target.display: The amount of items or instances
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.quantity` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.quantity`

element.display: The date until which the product is expected to be good for consumption

target.display: The date until which the product is expected to be good for consumption
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.instance.useBy` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.instance.useBy`

element.display: Known or suspected allergens that are a part of this product

target.display: Known or suspected allergens that are a part of this product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.knownAllergen` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.knownAllergen`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Manufacturer, representative or officially responsible for the product

target.display: Manufacturer, representative or officially responsible for the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.manufacturer` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.manufacturer`

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Comments made about the product

target.display: Comments made about the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.note` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `NutritionProduct.note` - note has change due to type change: R4B `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `note`

element.display: The product's nutritional information expressed by the nutrients

target.display: The product's nutritional information expressed by the nutrients
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient`

element.display: The amount of nutrient expressed in one or more units: X per pack / per serving / per dose

target.display: The amount of nutrient expressed in one or more units: X per pack / per serving / per dose
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.amount` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.amount` - amount has change due to type change: R4B `amount` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `amount`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.id`

element.display: The (relevant) nutrients in the product

target.display: The (relevant) nutrients in the product
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.item` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.item`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.nutrient.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `NutritionProduct.nutrient.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Specifies descriptive properties of the nutrition product
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
Code specifying the type of characteristic
The value of the characteristic
active | inactive | entered-in-error

target.display: active | inactive | entered-in-error
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/nutritionproduct-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/nutritionproduct-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `NutritionProduct.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `NutritionProduct.text`
